mapper.insert: insert into login_record (login_id, login_ip, login_type, login_equipment, login_date, login_user_id, login_success, login_fail_reason) values (#{loginId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginEquipment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loginUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginSuccess,jdbcType=BIT}, #{loginFailReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update login_record set login_ip = #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_type = #{loginType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_equipment = #{loginEquipment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_date = #{loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, login_user_id = #{loginUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_success = #{loginSuccess,jdbcType=BIT}, login_fail_reason = #{loginFailReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where login_id = #{loginId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select login_id, login_ip, login_type, login_equipment, login_date, login_user_id, login_success, login_fail_reason from login_record where login_id = #{loginId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select login_id, login_ip, login_type, login_equipment, login_date, login_user_id, login_success, login_fail_reason from login_record
